content: Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only. To be able to add further admins, contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message that informs users when their tariff plan almost reaches its limit, indicating that only user permissions will be available. It appears in the UI as a notification or alert. The message encourages users to contact an administrator for assistance in upgrading their tariff plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To be able to add further admins' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha çox administrator əlavə etmək üçün...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To upgrade the tariff plan' could be more accurately translated as 'tarif planını yüksəltmək'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tarif planını yüksəltmək üçün

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Chcete-li mít možnost přidávat další administrátory" is a bit clunky. A more natural translation would be "Pro přidání dalších administrátorů" or "Abyste mohli přidat další administrátory".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pro přidání dalších administrátorů

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthetical “(Uživatel)” feels unnecessary and disrupts the flow. The term 'User' is already clearly understood in context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Po dosažení limitu budou všichni uživatelé přidáni pouze s oprávněním User. Pro přidání dalších administrátorů kontaktujte administrátora {{productName}}, který provede upgrade tarifního plánu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is not accurately translated. "Voidaksesi lisätä pääkäyttäjiä" implies that the user is *trying* to add admins, which isn't the intended meaning. The original means it will happen automatically when the limit is reached.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kun raja on saavutettu, pääkäyttäjiä lisätään automaattisesti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the {{productName}} administrator to upgrade the tariff plan" is a bit wordy. While technically correct, it can be more concise and natural in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ota yhteyttä {{productName}}:n ylläpitäjään tilauksen päivittämiseksi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon in '{{productName}}:n' seems a bit awkward. While grammatically acceptable, it's not the most natural flow in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ota yhteyttä {{productName}}-ylläpitäjään tilauksen päivittämiseksi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Այլ ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing might be something like "եւս ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար" or "վայելացնելու համար ավելին ադմիններ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: եւս ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Once the limit is reached' is not directly translated. The Japanese translation doesn't convey the sense of 'once' or 'upon reaching' the limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 制限に達すると (restrictions reach) is acceptable, but a more direct translation of 'once the limit is reached' could be '制限に達した場合' (seitai ni tassu baai).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'permissions' isn't explicitly translated, leaving it as '権限' (ken'gen). While technically correct, it lacks the nuance of 'user permissions'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ユーザー権限のみ (yuuzaa ken'gen nomi) - explicitly states 'user permissions only'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To be able to add further admins' is translated too literally. It could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: さらに管理者を追加するには (sarani kanri-sha o tsuika suru ni wa) is better, although slightly longer.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເມື່ອບັນຫາຂีดຈຳກັດຖືກບັນລຸແລ້ວ" is a somewhat awkward translation of "Once the limit is reached". A more natural translation would be something like "ເມື່ອເຕືອນຂีดຈຳກັດແລ້ວ" or "ເມື່ອບັນລຸຂີດຈຳກັດແລ້ວ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເມື່ອເຕືອນຂີດຈຳກັດແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ສິດການໃຊ້ງານຜູ້ໃຊ້" translates literally to "user usage rights" but a better equivalent of "User permissions" would be something like "ສິດການເຂົ້າໃຊ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້" or simply "ສິດຜູ້ໃຊ້"
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສິດຜູ້ໃຊ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ຍົກລະດັບ' is the correct term for upgrading, but in a context of subscription/tariffs, a term like 'ເພີ່ມລະດັບ' might be considered more conversational and fitting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພີ່ມລະດັບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Once the limit is reached' is translated as 'Quando o limite for atingido'. While technically correct, it lacks the immediacy and warning tone of the original. A more impactful translation might be 'Assim que o limite for atingido' or 'No momento em que o limite for atingido'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Assim que o limite for atingido

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User permissions only' is translated as 'permissões de Utilizador'.  While grammatically correct, it lacks the clarity of implying that all users will have a *limited* set of permissions. A more accurate translation might emphasize the restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: permissões de Utilizador apenas

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "permisiunea de Utilizator" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey "User permissions." A more natural translation would be something like "permisiuni de utilizator".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: permisiuni de utilizator

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "schimba" (to change) is not the best fit for 'upgrade' in this context. 'Upgrade' implies moving to a higher tier, not just a simple change.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: actualizați

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "සියලු පරිශීලකයින් පරිශීලක අවසර සහිතව පමණක් එකතු කරනු ලැබේ" is a somewhat awkward translation of 'all users will be added with User permissions only'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'සියලු පරිශීලකයින් පමනක් පරිශීලක අවසරයෙන් එක්රැකිනු ලැබේ' or 'සියලු පරිශීලකයින් පමනක් පරිශීලක අවසරයෙන් එක්වනහ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු පරිශීලකයින් පමනක් පරිශීලක අවසරයෙන් එක්රැකිනු ලැබේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් එකතු කිරීමට" is not the most natural way to say 'To be able to add further admins'. A more fluent phrasing would be 'තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් යෙදවීමට' or 'තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයින් යෙදවීමට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයින් යෙදවීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිපාලකයාගෙන්' uses a possessive suffix unnecessarily.  While grammatically valid, in this context 'පරිපාලකයා' is more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිපාලකයා

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure can be improved for better readability. The connection between contacting the administrator and upgrading the tariff isn't immediately clear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයින් යෙදවීමට, {{productName}} පරිපාලකයාගෙන් සම්බන්ධ වී ගාස්තුව වැඩි කර ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses a full stop after 'načrta' which is incorrect in this context. It should be a comma.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ko želite dodati nadaljnje skrbnike, se za nadgradnjo tarifnega načrta,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of bolding for 'Корисничким дозволама' is inconsistent with the English original. The English version doesn't have bolding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the bolding from 'Корисничким дозволама'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Da biste mogli dalje da dodajete admine' is a bit awkward. While grammatically correct, it could be more natural in Serbian. The use of 'dalje' is slightly redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste mogli da dodajete admine...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Korisničkim dozvolama' is technically correct for 'User permissions', a more common and natural phrasing in this context would be 'Korisničkim pravima'. 'Dozvole' often refers to more specific permissions within a system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Korisničkim pravima

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation includes the placeholder '{{productName}}'. This should be verified to ensure the correct product name is inserted during implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that '{{productName}}' is replaced with the appropriate product name during implementation.  Consider if a direct translation of 'productName' is needed or if the original English term is more appropriate for the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is awkwardly translated as "Để có thể thêm quản trị viên". A more natural and clearer translation would be "Để có thể thêm các quản trị viên khác" or "Để có thể thêm quản trị viên".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để có thể thêm các quản trị viên khác

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "contact the {{productName}} administrator" is rendered as "hãy liên hệ với quản trị viên {{productName}}". While technically correct, it can be more naturally phrased as "liên hệ với bộ phận quản trị viên {{productName}}" or "liên hệ với người quản lý {{productName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: liên hệ với bộ phận quản trị viên {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only' is not entirely captured by '所有新添加用户将仅具有用户权限'. It implies that existing users are unaffected, while the English suggests all users, including potentially existing ones, will be affected when the limit is reached. A more accurate translation would clarify that *new* users will have User permissions only.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 一旦达到限制，所有*新增*用户将仅具有用户权限。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation retains the `{{productName}}` placeholder, consistent with the English content.  This is generally acceptable but requires review by the implementation team to ensure proper substitution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but confirm proper substitution of `{{productName}}`.
